name: Thornetta Davis
description: '''Thornetta Davis''' (born August 11, 1963) is an American [[Detroit blues]] and rhythm and blues singer. She has opened for [[Bonnie Raitt]], [[Gladys Knight]], and [[Etta James]], and sang backing vocals on [[Bob Seger]]'s 1991 album, ''[[The Fire Inside (Bob Seger album)|The Fire Inside]]''. She also worked with [[Kid Rock]] and [[Alberta Adams]], and has released three solo albums.
